section.name: FileStore
section.p: Could someone write something on this?

subsection.name: Important note on building
subsection.p: The installer subproject uses the javaapp maven plugin. To build this project you must install this plugin first with: maven -Dmaven.repo.remote=http://www.ibiblio.org/maven,http://maven-plugins.sf.net/maven -DartifactId=maven-javaapp-plugin -DgroupId=maven-plugins -Dversion=1.3 plugin:download
